title.narrative: Local Government Financing and Budget Reform Program Cluster (Subprogram 1)

description.narrative: Given the many issues facing the Philippine LGU (Local Government Unit) sector, a focused and consolidated program is required to respond to them. The Program must first help ensure the availability of resources. The LGFBR (Local Government Financing and Budget Reform) Program (i) facilitates an augmented, dependable, and timely flow of resources that the LGUs are legally entitled to as well as facilitating other means of financing through public and private channels; (ii) facilitates local revenue generation; (iii) addresses the capacity development needs of LGUs in planning, expenditure management, and efficient procurement for better service delivery; and (iv) improves monitoring systems by making the financial and service delivery performance of LGUs more transparent.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Interior and Local Government
